summary: McLibel is the story of two ordinary people who humiliated McDonald's in the biggest corporate PR disaster in history.
cast: Helen Steel|Dave Morris|Bruce Alexander|Anita Anand|Peter Armstrong|Chris Brierley|Rhona Cameron|T. Colin Campbell|Sue Dibb|Pip Donaghy|Ian Flintoff|Oliver Ford Davies|Dan Gallin|Stephen Gardner|Geoffrey Giuliano|Wilson Haagens|Richard Hope|Frank Hutson|Sarah Inglis|Howard Lyman|Linda McGuire|Nick Miles|Charlie Morris|Simon O'Brien|Charles O'Leary|Fred Pearson|Paul Preston|Eric Schlosser|Charles Secrett|Keir Starmer|Alfie Thomas|Malcolm Tierney|Fran Tiller|Louise Wallis|Katie Razzall|Jon Snow
title: McLibel
